text: wkma 'anzalna -ayha alrswl- alkutub ealaa man qablik min alrsl, 'anzalna 'iilayk hdha alkitab almsdq lilkutub alsabqt, faladhin ataynahum alkitab min bani 'iisrayiyl ferfwh haqa merfth yuminun balqran, wmin hwla' alearab min quraysh wghyrhm man yumin bh, wala yunkir alquran 'aw ytshkk fi dlaylh wbrahynh albayinat 'iilaa alkafirun aladhin dabuhm aljhwd walenad
